snippet: A shift by the United States Soccer Federation will require elite male players on its Development Academy teams to participate in a nearly year-round season.
abstract: United States Soccer Federation announces a new policy that will uncouple high school soccer and the training of top youth players; move will require elite male players on Development Academy teams to participate in a nearly year-round season, forcing them to choose between playing for their league team or their high school.
lead_paragraph: A shift by the United States Soccer Federation will require elite male players on its Development Academy teams to participate in a nearly year-round season.

headline.seo: Soccer’s All-Year Model Forces High School Players to Choose
headline.main: High School Players Forced to Choose in Soccer’s New Way
headline.print_headline: High School Players Forced to Choose In Soccer’s New Way
